options.systemMessage:
=Current timestamp datetime: {{   new Date().toLocaleString("en-MY", {
  timeZone: "Asia/Jakarta",
  weekday: "long",
  year: "numeric",
  month: "long",
  day: "numeric",
  hour: "2-digit",
  minute: "2-digit",
  second: "2-digit",
});
 }}
You are Booking Restaurant.
You must only respond to the <user-message> content.
You cannot process date earlier that current timestamp.
You are restricted to three specific actions, each mapped to one tool. If user ask anything outside of booking slots, mentioned sorry cannot do that , maybe next time

1. Get current date time
Tool: TIMESTAMP_TOOL


```
 Get current timestamp
```


2. Create a booking and must at least provide valid user email ,phone and name. Pay attention to the json input
Tool: CREATE_BOOKING_TOOL
```
curl -X POST 'https://n8n.io/webhook-test/suarify-make-booking' 
-H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '
 {
    "name":"Eden Rekno",
    "email":"eden@example.com",
    "phone":"+62823456789",
    "date":"2025-09-17",
    "time":"14:30",
    "source":"Booking System"
}' 
```

3. Check booking slots available for a particular date. Pay attention to the json input
Tool: GET_BOOKING_TOOL
```
example user asked about 18sept2025 slots

curl -X POST 'https://n8n.io/webhook-test/suarify-check-booking-date' 
-H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '
{
   date: "2025-09-18"
}' 
```

parameters.description: Call this tool to get current date and time.

parameters.toolDescription:
## Create a Booking :  MAKE A BOOKING ENDPOINT

### Purpose 
This workflow provides a webhook API endpoint that your frontend can easily integrate typically triggered by a submit button on a booking form.
When the frontend calls this REST API, the workflow handles the booking logic by performing several key checks:
- Valid Input â€” Ensures all required fields are present and correctly formatted.
- Date & Time Validation â€” Confirms the requested slot falls within business hours, excludes lunch/dinner breaks, and respects public holidays.
- Conflict Detection â€” Checks for any existing bookings at the requested time to prevent overlaps.
- Calendar Integration â€” Once all checks pass, the workflow automatically creates a booking entry in your Google Calendar, keeping everything synced and visible.

### Examples
![Alt Text](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dragonjump/suarify-booking/59a519ce4ebbaf58e4173c0914dce3ec617c44f8/demo-makebooking.gif)


### How to integrate
1. Connect your frontend interface to this api below. You may  change the base endpoint to `webhook` or `webhook-test` depending on your environment.

You can also change the based the endpoint 'https://n8n.io' to your own hosted domain like 'https://mycustomdomain.io/'

```
curl -X POST 'https://n8n.io/webhook-test/suarify-make-booking' 
-H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '
 {
    "name":"John Doe",
    "email":"john@example.com",
    "phone":"+60123456789",
    "date":"2025-09-17",
    "time":"14:30",
    "source":"Booking System"
}' 
```

2. You will see a sample output response:


```
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Booking confirmed successfully!",
    "bookingDetails": {
        "name": "John Doe",
        "email": "john@example.com",
        "phone": "+60123456789",
        "date": "2025-09-17",
        "time": "14:30",
        "eventId": "1sin1h9cp7dh779g3s4c15dbqo",
        "eventLink": "https://www.google.com/calendar/event?eid=MXNbjFoOWNwN2RoNzc5ZzNzNGMxNWRicW8gZGI5OGJiMjhiNzcxNjU4ZjE3YzQzNzE2MzY2MGI2NzcyMTYzZThhYWE5NWIwMDI1OWMxZDFkNDA4M2YwNThjNkBn",
        "calendarEvent": { }
    },
    "confirmationMessage": "Hi John Doe, your booking has been confirmed for 2025-09-17 at 14:30 Malaysia time. You will receive a calendar invitation shortly."
}
```

## Get Booking Slots :  FETCH BOOKING SLOTS ENDPOINT

### Purpose 
This workflow powers a REST API endpoint designed to respond when a user interacts with the frontend booking form and selects a specific date.

Upon receiving the request, the endpoint returns a list of available time slots that can be booked. If the selected slot is already occupied, the system will mark the slot accordingly.
In cases where no slots for the entire day such as during public holidays, weekends, or scheduled closures â€” the response will clearly indicate that bookings are not possible on that day.



### Examples
![Alt Text](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dragonjump/suarify-booking/59a519ce4ebbaf58e4173c0914dce3ec617c44f8/demo-timeslot.gif)


### How to integrate
1. Connect your frontend interface to this api below. You may  change the base endpoint to `webhook` or `webhook-test` depending on your environment.

You can also change the based the endpoint 'https://n8n.io' to your own hosted domain like 'https://mycustomdomain.io/'

```
curl -X POST 'https://n8n.io/webhook-test/suarify-check-booking-date' 
-H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '
{
   date: "2025-09-18"
}' 
```

2. You will see a sample output response:


```
{
    "success": true,
    "isWorkingDay": true,
    "isWeekend": false,
    "holidayName": "",
    "holidayMessage": "",
    "weekendMessage": "",
    "availableSlots": [
        {
            "time": "09:30",
            "display": "9:30 AM - 10:30 AM",
            "available": false,
            "status": "booked"
        },
        {
            "time": "10:30",
            "display": "10:30 AM - 11:30 AM",
            "available": false,
            "status": "booked"
        },
        {
            "time": "11:30",
            "display": "11:30 AM - 12:30 PM",
            "available": false,
            "status": "booked"
        },
        {
            "time": "11:30",
            "display": "12:30 AM - 2:30 PM",
            "available": false,
            "status": "booked"
        },
        {
            "time": "14:30",
            "display": "2:30 PM - 3:30 PM",
            "available": false,
            "status": "booked"
        },
        {
            "time": "15:30",
            "display": "3:30 PM - 4:30 PM",
            "available": true
        },
        {
            "time": "16:30",
            "display": "4:30 PM - 5:30 PM",
            "available": false,
            "status": "booked"
        },
        {
            "time": "17:30",
            "display": "5:30 PM - 6:30 PM",
            "available": true
        },
        {
            "time": "17:30",
            "display": "6:30 PM - 8:30 PM",
            "available": false
        },
        {
            "time": "20:30",
            "display": "8:30 PM - 9:30 PM",
            "available": false,
            "status": "booked"
        }
    ],
    "dateInfo": {
        "success": true,
        "error": null,
        "checkData": {
            "date": "2025-09-18",
            "timestamp": "2025-09-16T06:58:56.210Z"
        },
        "parsedDate": {
            "year": 2025,
            "month": 9,
            "day": 18,
            "dayOfWeek": 4,
            "dayName": "Thursday",
            "isWeekend": false
        }
    },
    "holidayEvents": [],
    "calendarEvents": [  ],
    "totalConflicts": 6
}
```
